item.title: Lorena add a quote by Gabriel García Márquez
item.description: "Ninguna persona que merece tus lagrimas. Y quien las merezcas no te hara llorar." -- Gabriel García Márquez

item.title: Lorena add a quote by Jerome K. Jerome
item.description: "I like work: it fascinates me. I can sit and look at it for hours." -- Jerome K. Jerome

item.title: Lorena add a quote by Salvador Dalí
item.description: "Intelligence without ambition is a bird without wings." -- Salvador Dalí

item.title: Lorena add a quote by Gabriel García Márquez
item.description: "Tell him yes. Even if you are dying of fear, even if you are sorry later, because whatever you do, you will be sorry all the rest of your life if you say no." -- Gabriel García Márquez

item.title: Lorena add a quote by Gabriel García Márquez
item.description: "With her Florentino Ariza learned what he had already experienced many times without realizing it: that one can be in love with several people at the same time, feel the same sorrow with each, and not betray any of them. Alone in the midst of the crowd on the pier, he said to himself in a flash of anger: 'My heart has more rooms than a whorehouse." -- Gabriel García Márquez

item.title: Lorena add a quote by Gabriel García Márquez
item.description: "He was still too young to know that the heart's memory eliminates the bad and magnifies the good, and that thanks to this artifice we manage to endure the burden of the past." -- Gabriel García Márquez

item.title: Lorena add a quote by Gabriel García Márquez
item.description: "It was the year they fell into devastating love. Neither one could do anything except think about the other, dream about the other, and wait for letters with the same impatience they felt when they answered them." -- Gabriel García Márquez
